issue.title: Splitwise App
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

**Features:**
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups, add expenses
- Split equally, view balances

**Tech:** Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js

**Pages:** Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Create project foundation with Next.js 14 setup, including package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, Google OAuth provider, better-sqlite3, shadcn/ui, Tailwind), tsconfig.json with strict mode, .gitignore for Next.js, and initialize basic project structure (app/ directory, components/, lib/, prisma/ for SQLite schema).
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system and database layer. Create NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider, design and implement SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, and balances using Prisma ORM. Build all database models, migrations, and seed data. Owns: lib/auth.ts, lib/prisma.ts, prisma/schema.prisma, app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts.

workers.task: Create Prisma schema and database configuration. Define all database models (User, Account, Session, Group, Expense, ExpenseSplit, Balance) with proper relationships and constraints. Create prisma/schema.prisma file with SQLite provider, run migrations, and create seed data for testing.

Create Prisma client singleton and database utilities. Implement lib/prisma.ts with global Prisma client instance to prevent multiple instances in development. Create database query helper functions for users, groups, expenses, and balances operations.

Implement NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider. Create lib/auth.ts with NextAuth configuration including Google provider, session strategy, and callbacks. Create API route at app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts to handle authentication requests. Include environment variable validation for Google OAuth credentials.

ems.task: Build core application logic and API routes. Implement group creation/management, expense creation with equal splitting logic, balance calculation algorithms, and all CRUD operations. Create RESTful API endpoints for groups and expenses. Owns: app/api/groups/, app/api/expenses/, lib/calculations.ts, lib/actions.ts for server actions.

workers.task: Create database schema and SQLite connection setup. Define all database tables (groups, group_members, expenses, expense_participants) with proper relationships and indexes. Create database initialization and connection utilities.

Implement balance calculation logic and expense splitting algorithms. Create functions to calculate individual shares, track balances between users, compute net balances, and determine who owes whom. Create utility functions for debt settlement calculations.

Create all API routes for groups and expenses. Implement RESTful endpoints for group CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete, list members), expense CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete, list by group), and balance retrieval endpoints. Include proper validation, error handling, and TypeScript types.

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages. Build landing page, login/logout flow, dashboard with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists and balance views. Integrate shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.) with Tailwind styling. Owns: app/page.tsx, app/login/page.tsx, app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, components/ui/, components/expense-form.tsx, components/balance-card.tsx.

workers.task: Create all landing page UI and authentication UI (public-facing pages). Build app/page.tsx landing page with hero section, features overview, and call-to-action. Create app/login/page.tsx with Google OAuth button. Set up basic layout structure.

Create dashboard UI and group overview pages. Build app/dashboard/page.tsx showing user's groups with create group functionality. Create app/group/[id]/page.tsx group detail page with expense list, balance overview, and add expense button. Create dashboard-specific UI components.

Set up shadcn/ui components and create shared UI components for expenses and balances. Initialize and configure all shadcn/ui components in components/ui/. Create components/expense-form.tsx for adding/editing expenses. Create components/balance-card.tsx for displaying user balances and amounts owed. Create shared utilities for formatting currency and dates.

analysisSummary: Build a complete expense-sharing application with Google OAuth authentication, group management, expense tracking, and balance calculations. Tech stack: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, SQLite database, and NextAuth.js.
